reviews.review: 来来赶紧来妹子多多

【黎明杀机】3年了才玩500+小时，不多也不少：
从神技弹射到砍疲劳换平稳着陆，从人手一个打击到打击没人用，从怀表强换到一命换一命，从开门混分到人手一刀斩，从各种萌新到20段就盘盘碰厄咒、出局护士长。
       丧心病狂屠皇很多，人皇略少，毕竟现在屠夫强势，溜拔过不少屠夫，也秒倒过很多次。
       一句实话，我不喜欢作弊，作弊的游戏没有灵魂！在挡住了N多次刷血点的诱惑之后，终于在一次血亏的游戏回档帮助下，刷了血点，傻就傻在我当时是个steam萌新，现在才发现不该给自己精心打造的号上刷血点，现在罪有应得（可怜我号上的一些稀有皮肤啊）。
       对于只玩人的我来说，虽然刷了血点，我也没有使用多少道具，尤其是苹果和齿轮。我奉行的是空手套白狼政策，还是带着开箱技能（笑）。
       现在的血点比以前那是三倍经验，还有各种双倍经验活动（那就是6倍），劝大家一句，别刷血点，只要肯玩绝对不缺血点。双修就辛苦点。
这垃圾游戏早晚凉凉，该封禁的不封禁，透视外挂举报多少次没用，居然把我没用外挂的封禁了。你这破游戏就照顾那些用挂的孤儿吧！
ez juke

Очень крутая и прикольная игра если хочешь поиграть с друзьями и поорать . Советую любителем побояться и просто кому интересно ! Почти все DLS сбалонсированы , даже с Фреди Крюгером DLS не такой уж и имбовый . Очень интересная игра . Удачи с маньяками и чтоб они не кемперили ) !

This game had some MASSIVE isseues in the earlyer days but after taking a break for a while and comming back to a complete game. I love it agin! i just wish i could get all the older players back to play this new and cleaner version of this game.

Hey community, personally, I'd recommend this, great lan game, online multiplayer. Decent community, better on the killer side of things because they don't teabag, quit, dc even if they don't get what they want. Survivor community however is 50/50. Survive with friends, by far most toxic community. I'm a killer main, and I've gone against a 4 man group who did nothing but play like ass. Climb the rank, and I'm sure you'll find out what I mean.
 
TLDR; game is great aside my two concerns. I'd recommend picking it up, really cheap too on sale! But this review is to at least help the community see what it has become since the DLC release.

Anyway my main two issues with the game is the unbalanced DLC and the somewhat garbage customer service,
First off, I can attest to the DLC being completely unbalanced. I'm a killer main but I play with a friend, and boy, those Freddy matches were horrible. Yes, Freddy might be the best Killer for SWF groups but it's not fun for duo or solo players. The dude's got xray vision on you if you're out of his terror range, and this is without having to use a perk. He speeds up as more generators get finished with a perk. He also blocks the exit gates with another. Like man, did they think about counter play when they made this guy? Flashlights are rendered ineffective because most likely you can't see his face. He's outdoing the Wraith's invisibility and Michael Myers jumpscare capability. In the dream world there is no way to wake up other than have another player with you or fail skill checks, which by the way still reveals your position. Even after that he can still put you back to sleep. 
Some balancing ideas: 
let the survivors have a wake up mechanic similar to the snap out of it with the doctor.
Or incorporate levels of sleep ie: drowsy-sleep-deep sleep (unable to wake).
Or survivors wake up when they get tagged. 
Or sleep has a timer.
Or sleep has a short cooldown before being able to put someone back to sleep immediately after waking up.
Or remove the aura reading from Freddy if he pulls someone into the dreamworld but hearing is amplified (this can separate great Freddys to decent ones).
Or increase the number of skill checks when you're asleep. 
Or remove being able to see survivors outside terror radius, I feel like this one broke it the most. 
Or as my friend suggested, make Freddy an event Killer (availability only during certain events).

Second line of issue: everybody knows this and I'm not the only one. They have garbage customer services. Bots answering for them and telling you they're working on it. But days, weeks, months later, nothing. I lost my progress twice now. Once on a level 15 Nurse and level 15 Jake. I actually didn't mind when this happened because I thought that's how rank resets worked. But then it happened again, Level 30 something David and Level 45+ Huntress, all down the drain. This is where I almost quit the game. It is super frustrating, I was on a crappy connection but I didn't think that was supposed to be an issue though. I know people have had it worse and have not had their things returned for months. Mine's ongoing for nearly a month now but yeah 60+ hours just disappears that easily.

Sorry DBD developers, but if you dont get people like this off your game I'm not sure if I can support what you do. Sincerely, yer boi with the dankest of memes. [b]Dead by daylight will make your heart beat and you will feel the tension when sneaking around or getting chased by a raving psycopath! A must have for everyone who like horror![/b]

I love this game, thats that, of course there are situations, buffs, and nerfs they should focus on but lets talk about why this game deserves my recommendation.

The Killer:
Aah~ My favorite role, the Killer. Adrenaline courses you, checking back and fourth in areas trying to find the survivor. And once you find your prey, the epic chase begins. You as the Killer has to make sure not to waste too much time with this one person unless you have certain perks like the Obsession which buffs you for doing certain objectives against one certain person. But back to the chase, you find yourself having to dodge obstacles that Survivors use to get away much easier from you, if you're able to succeed in cutting them off or catch up, you now have to hit them at least once(if the survivor is injured) or twice( if they're not injured). Once the Survivor is down, your main objective is to then hook them and IMMIDATELY look for other survivors, because a Killer that waits for his victim to die on the hook only wastes their time and helps the Survivors repair the generators (without any threat) which are needed to escape(Plus, camping is cheating and just stupid). Once the survivor is on the hook other survivors will try to get them off, but you must make sure to not let them repair the generators. If you're able to do this 3 other times to the other survivors, you win and is satifying. Others may escape, which is expected if you are a new Killer or if the Survivors have good jukes and aid each other, or if you let them get too many generators and escape through the hatch or gate. Killer is so fun to play! BUT THEN, there are the Killers I know people hate and just go "BS" when they see it, know the Killers that make people go, "WOW!" or "What the (insert)", and know the Killers that people have fun wih making the say "YAY!~".

KEY
That's BS Killers= Killers that are too easy to play and make people hate you and is not balanced
YAY!~ Killers= Skilled (OR) fun to play against and balanced
Sorta Fair Killers= In between

The Killers: (Ones I mainly play and sometimes play, some are NOT heavily reviewed because I haven't played them)
(Normals Killers and DLC Killers)
Normal Killers
Evan MacMillan-The Trapper: "IT'S A TRAP!" (YAY!~)
You guessed it, the Trapper traps traps!...Oh wait, cut that part out, the Trappers core ability is to place bear traps around the ground being able to place as many as he can with the ones that are provided by the area. Once a Survivor runs over a trap, they will be caught in it and have to struggle out of it counting as 2 hits which equals instadown. Survivors can get rid of his traps, but first they have to find it, there are also perks that help the Survivors them a bit easier. You can of course also hit people instead too when chasing them. The Trapper is balanced too and takes tactics. I myself as a Trapper, I make it more fun for the Survivors as in some Trappers put Beartraps uner the Survivors the moment they hook someone so the Survivors have to disable it(Which alerts you where they are), since I play more fair, instead of doing that, I put my traps in places where Survivors would want to run if I'm chasing them and I never place traps under the Survivors. Trapper is my favorite to play as. Survivors Ratings would be 4/5 to play against again

Max Thompson Jr.-The Hillbilly: "yeeeeeehaaaAAAAAAAAW"*Gets louder* (YAY!~)
This Killer is really fun, CHARGE UP THAT CHAINSAW AND YEEEEEHAW! You'll find yourself zooming through the area, trying to one shot people with that charge to instadown them. You can also teach yourself to charge and quickly swing one shot someone standing right infront of you. This guy takes some skill to play here and there. Good survivors can easily juke him and if they have the right douchey perks then yeah. Using the Chainsaw for getting around the map is also useful. This one is my second favorite. Survivors Rating would 5/5 to play against

Philip Ojomo-The Wraith: I'm bullied and no one likes me... (That's BS)
Oh this guy...So, just an quick fyi, don't play him. No one likes him. He's REALLY camoflauged and sorta invisible when he enters the BS form. As a survivor, you sense NO PANIC which is needed for telling you if the killer is getting closer, but this is only when he is invisible, but it doesn't matter because he would already be right on top the survivor when he uncloaks. This is my least favorite killer because I know people don't like playing against him. He's just not fair and is boring to go against. Survivors Rating would be 1/5 to play against.

Sally Smithson-The Nurse: Ugh, why can't people be as skilled as me...? (YAY!~) (Hardest to master)
Holy zoinky, the Nurse flys all over the place and zooms here and there, technically teleporting! Sounds OP af right? Wrong, everytime you zoom, you will stun yourself and wow it is annoying, but mastering these zooms can reward you easily being able to avoid obstacles and getting to running Survivors quickly. Survivor perks though sorta overpower her, but mastering this nurses moves will have people respect you and see you as a master. Survivors Rating would be 5/5 to play against. (You'll rarely see this Killer sadly...)

Anna-The Huntress: *Sings the Lalala song from Smurfs" (Haven't played her, will update soon)

DLC Killers:
Michael Myers-The Shape: Hey...Uh, there's this guy that's just staring at me... (YAY!~)
This is my favorite DLC character because he is of course a classic, actually kinda of spooky to play against when a survivor, and is the second most balanced out of all of them, surprisingly. A Michael Myers, your main objective is to literally just stare at people. Then you'll level up your meter to level 3(from staring) and once you reach level 3 of stalking, for a duration of time you'll be able to one shot people instead of having to hit them twice, you also gain a obession which is a certain someone that you will usually be bullying the most throughout the game. So make sure you stay out of his line of sight Survivors! Survivors Ratings would be 4/5 to play against.

Herman Carter-The Doctor: I see you~ ZAAP! (That's BS)
So, I haven't played this guy yet.....But trust me, as a survivor and going against this guy, you would just want to leave. Survivors Ratings would be 1/5 to play against. Sorry, I don't buy Killer's that are BS.

Lisa Sherwood-The Hag: Swamp Lady Thing (That's BS)
The Hag fits her name because you're an donkeyhole for playing her, she INSTANTly teleports to you if step over a ALMOST INVISIBLE trap that jump scares the Survivor and allows the Hag to teleport to you. The only thing she succs at is running because she's a bit slow, constantly, every Hag you'll play against will probably place a trap under a hooked Survivor and you can only get rid of the traps with a flashlight which you wont always have as a survivor. I haven't bought her because she's BS and is annoying. Survivors Ratings 2/5 to play against. 

Junior Sawyer-The Cannibal: Leatherface guy (YAY!~)
This is my opinion but probably because I succ at him or it's because of how he is. But he SUCCS, Leatherface's ability is to swing a chainsaw(sound like someone else)but multiple times, but he does it while standing in place sorta and swings way to long while standing in place. It can hit multiple Survivors at a time, but to easily counter that just don't all be together or too close to each when ever someone is being chased. (Haven't bought)Survivors Ratings: 5/5

The Nightmare-Freddy Krueger: Literally the meaning of "You can run but you can't hide!" (Eh)
As a Killer Main, I can't exactly say Freddy is game breaking or ridiculous, though I can say he seems CLOSE to being balanced. To me, he's weaker than the Wraith and more fun to play against the Wraith. He can only damage people if they are put to sleep but he is completely invisible and the so. He has to first find someone put then put them to sleep and then he can damage, sees u 2. Counter=TEAMWORK SR:3/5
BEST GAME
Muy buen juego, de graficos va bien, y para conseguir partidas es rapido y son muy estables, me parece una exelente compra

recomendado 10/10

So just a headliner I bought this game on 50% off and so will be judging it's worth against that value.

In playing the game I've enjoyed the layout so far, I find the whole setup with perks and add-ons exciting and I like the different mechanisms that can be used in terms of playstyles; sabotaging, helping friends, lone wolfing, ect.
I find the atmosphere scary, not absolutely horrifying but it keeps you on edge none the less.

I do have problems with it; if I tab out whilst in the match finding thing it never finds a match and I have to reopen the game, killers being able to see you through walls can be really OP and frustrating, there are bugs which will really frustrate you and sometimes the graphics are out of sync with the animations and so it's unaligned.
The spacebar struggle requires a lot of effort and if you're being camped whilst struggling you might as well just let yourself die.

I'm relatively new to the game but I've learnt a thing or two, I would point out I wish there was a wider range of clothes but I do like that there are prestige clothes for characters, I love the range of killers and the different fears they can encompass. Kruger is a load of fudge and sucks jawbreakers, keep it simple and sweet.

Would I recommend buying this on 50% off? Yes I would, but I should clarify it'd be more fun with other friends who have it.

People still play it with 4k+ hours so it must be alright
It's like living in a slasher movie. No other game makes me feel terror like this one. I honestly can't play more than 2-3 rounds per night without getting heart palpitations and needed to detox.
It's a good game, but the support is horriable.I lost all my progress after 50 hour's, and still have been waiting on them to make this right for a month now. Come on already.

フレディ出て崩壊だの言ってる方が多いのですがそこまで強いですか？
今はフレディ対策出来てる方が多くてその人達のお陰で脱出も出来ますよ！
と言うかフレディ以外にも新しいキラーが出る度に崩壊だの騒ぐのはどーかと思います。
新規には難しいと思いますがそれはフレディ以外も同じです。
自分もセールで新規に始めましたがどんなキラーが来ても最初はやられまくりましたよ！
ですが始めて数日経ちますがキラーの特性と対策を身につければ以外に逃げれます。
もちろんパークは大事ですのでパークが無い時は取れるまで諦めずやり込む事です。
段々面白くなり病みつきになってきますw
時にはキラーで遊ぶのも気分転換にもなるしキラーを知る事が出来ますよ！

(this will be my first review in steam)
What a fun game to began with and completely unpredictable makes this game unique~ Never get bored even after playing for straight hours (4-5 hours straight, no problem~) for very random moments and behavior everytime!

Of course, i do meet like noobs and pros situations in which a lil bit unfair (or extreme) is considered a normal thing with a very simple rule gameplay (killer sacrifices or kills the survivors, survivors need to escape) but with their own methods and unrestrictive gameplay is what this game plays the best. as simple control as possible, this game can be played with everyone even to inexperienced, first time player.

of course, random players (noob or high level) join together in a lobby of maximum 5, makes every mixed experiences to one. some may left behind or ace the game for differences in experience but getting learning how the pro plays is a good think and learn to be a better player. (though ability to spectate random lobby would be great~ to learn strategies and i would never watch any gameplay in YouTube again, and live gameplay nontheless~)

too bad i dont have enough friends that own this game that playing only among us with one of us as a killer is a bit boring without a total of 5 people. so this game should be sold as a 4-pack or complete 5-pack to be shared to other friends. 

game do have glitches and flaws but seriously, most are funny and even the annoying glitch will not overpowers the fun experiences with the game~

i highly recommend this game to everyone (of course, not underage for violence), but just bear with the a bit glitch and some unfair players, just get along with it and you will be irresistible to play even more.

PS, im so scared to The Doctor, my first encounter was a screen jumpscare that i just quited the game lol XD. though still scared to the killer (and really hope to not meet him for awhile), is quite an experiences~

Der Suchtfaktor des Spiels ist sehr groß für Spieler die "repetitiv gameplay" mögen... so wie mich.
Im Pvp ist jedes Spiel anders, weil man jedesmal gegen echte Menschen spielt, die sich anders verhalten.
So weit so gut... aber... das Spiel wird gebalanct für low rank noobs.
Zu Anfang erscheinen Killer übermächtig, aber je höher man im Rang aufsteigt desto mehr zeigt sich das Killer nur Rodeoclowns für die Survivor sind.
Die Playerbase der Survivor ist unglaublich toxisch, arrogant und herablassend.
Im Forum hören die Devs auf die Playerbase der Sruvivor, weil sie bei einem asymetrischen Spiel automatisch die Mehrzahl sind.
Wenn man also lieber Killer spielen möchte und an langfristigem kompetativem Spiel interessiert ist, dann FINGER WEG.
Das Spiel ist nicht gebalanct für Survivor Teams die Teamspeak benutzen und gibt ihnen einen enormen unfairen Vorteil.
Die Devs kümmert das aber nicht, weil sie angst vor negativen Reviews haben.
Deshalb jetzt nach meiner sehr langen Spielzeit in diesem Spiel ein negativer Review von mir.
Für casual gamer ist es gut, aber für ernsthafte Gamer ist es nix.
Es ist auch kaum als "horror survival" zu bezeichen, jedenfalls nicht im high rank gameplay.
Außerdem kommen zuviele payment DLCs raus, jeder DLC 7€ und im Endeffekt müssen nur Killerplayer den kaufen und werden damit von den Machern auch noch abgezockt für schlechten Support und Balance.

I used to like this game and play it on a regular basis, despite some minor glitches and issues. However, since the pile of crap that s the Nightmare On Elm Street DLC, I feel like uninstalling this crap off my computer. Not only is Freddy an overpowered and quite frankly, boring killer, his stupid dreamworld has completely screwed my game. Not only is it laggy when I'm in the dreamworld, the update has also taken up so much of my disk space with all of it's unecessary features and laggy, messy, LAZY work, that I can barely play the game anymore. Thank you Behaviour for making a wonderful game, and then ruining it with your sorry excuse for an update. I am considering uninstalling.

First of all... Before i write the review, i know there will probably be some people rating this "not helpful", since there are alot of people that have had a bad experience with this game, and say only bad, but this is just my experience o/

So... My experience with the game, is quite positive, everytime i take a time to play it for about 1-2 hours, there is always this feeling that i want to play it again, and again, which is good.
There have never been a gameplay, where i haven't raged, it's just natural, because i am still learning the mechanics.

About the most common problem with this game, is losing your files, which THANK THE LORD, haven't happened with me, and HOPEFULLY never will 🙏🏼

Obviously, i have also experienced alot of glitches, for example: floating survivor over killers shoulder, getting stuck in-between pallets, Floating survivor after being hooked, and MANY MORE.
Lately glitchy killers been the most annoying thing for me, its just impossible to play (at least i believe its their fault, if not games fault then?)

Then there is a question : Will it make me stop playing the game, because of these problems? Absolutely NO. This game is just addicting for me, i even think about the game in my sleep, or during lessons.

Also, lately the choice of killers have been wonderful \o/ , but as heard from other reviewers, PLEASE try to find a time, to fix the game, so it doesn't ruin our experience 👍🏼

In conclusion, this is one of multiplayer games, i actually ENJOY, and would love to get better at it even more. 
Without looking at the main problems of the game, i would definitely give it 10/10 , but sadly i give it [b]8/10[/b] 👍🏼

O jogo consiste em quatro sobreviventes que tem que ligar cinco geradores para abrir um portão e escapar enquanto um assassino tenta impedir e matar a todos.
Pontos negativos: O jogo não tem servidor de partidas, sendo assim você joga com o upload do host, que é o assassino, dono da sala, se você tiver internet mediana ninguém com internet mediana vai querer ficar na sua sala pois o ping será de 400 pra cima, também temos certo desbalanceamento de personagens, alguns assassinos são muito ruins e ninguém nem pega, alguns são muito bons se você tiver práticas, mas alguns como o Hillbilly simplesmente tem habilidades ruins, em contra partida alguns assassinos são incombatíveis, e esses são os PAGOS por DLC (que não são nada baratos), por exemplo o Freddy Krueger que simplesmente é invisível, não faz o som de aviso que todos os assassinos fazem e quando aparece te marca e ele sabe onde você está até você ser pego ou ser acordado por outro sobrevivente, agora me diga, quem quer ajudar uma pessoa que está marcada? É um sinalizador. Outra coisa também são os bugs gráficos, mas isso é de boa, são muito engraçados e não tão corriqueiros, mas já presenciei bugs de conecção que ocorrem 1 a cada 10 vezes, onde o jogo não acha sala infinitamente, fazendo você ter que fechar e reabrir o jogo, também o jogo é muito vazio durante o dia, em compensação é lotado pela noite.
Pontos positivos: O jogo é muito emocionante, o clima de tensão é constante, o jogo oferece brutalmente mais pontos pra quem fizer ações de ajudar outros sobreviventes o que faz os jogadores interagirem entre sí, até na hora de salvar, que é quase suicídio mas com sucesso tem ótima recompensa, outra coisa é a presença de sustos que em um jogo online é muito difícil de se ter, mas o ambiente faz lugares onde o assassino pode aparecer além de que alguns podem aparecer subtamente, o que é um pouco ruim como eu disse nos pontos negativos mas isso também tem sua graça no jogo. O assassino também ganha mais pontos se pendurar uma pessoa mais de uma vez, o que faz ele dar espaço para que outras pessoas salvem, o que é muito apoiado pela comunidade, sem campers! O jogo remete muito aos filmes de terror dos anos 80 o que faz realmente você se sentir na pele de um ator tendo que ajudar seus amigos e fazer de tudo para sobreviver, caaara, eu amo isso! E quando você fica por ultimo então? Haja coração!

Resumindo, minha nota final é 8, o jogo vale muito a pena comprar, se possível, espere promoção, ele sempre abaixa 50% de semestre em semestre.
Trash game.. they put out DLC content just to modify it in less then a week of it's release.
Топовая игрушка залипнуть можно,РЕКОМЕНДУЮ!
Killer Freddy estragando o jogo, total desbalanceado.
Крутая игра

Dead by Daylight is a great game with plently of maps and a plentiful variety of survivors and killers to choose from. From my experience I've ran into almost zero issues and couldn't be happier with the performance of the game. I could honestly play this for hours and bringing friends only adds to the fun. To be honest, I've played plenty of rounds and I've come to appreciate the multiple tactics that is surviving every killers different game styles. However, and here it comes, Freddy is undoubtably a very powerful foe. I'm not going to make the argument that he needs to be nerfed. I just believe that he needs to be ... tweaked slightly. I've had my fair share of wins and losses but not once having came across Freddy have I nor my randomly matchmaked party been able to successfully escape him. I invite challenges in games, besides that's what makes them way more fun, but Freddy is most definetly an overwhelming enemy. I in my good faith hope they find a fair way to balance the character for both stressed survivors and blood thirsty killers. If no compromise can be made or even the developers don't want to make changes I can accept that. So long as they add a feature where survivors can choose which Killers they DO and DO NOT want to encounter in matchmaking. It's a longshot but if that's what it takes I'll bite. Lastly, before anyone proclaims I'm a sore loser I'd like to contest that because I've played enough to have many Wins / Losses and I'm fine with that. However, when players start disconnecting in game or bite the dust once Freddy is the killer that's when there is an issue. Freddy has pretty much manifested himself into the in-game meme equivalent of certain death / failure itself. Anyone trying to voice their concerns can reach the developers at deadbydaylight@bhvr.com

На данный момент Я НЕНАВИЖУ эту игру!!1 Всё было хорошо до выхода имбалансного маньяка из DLC - A Nightmare on Elm Street. Нет я всё конечно понимаю я смотрел фильм Кошмар на улице Вязова, там Фреди был "МОЩНЫМ" и вторгался в чужие сны, в чужые разумы... Но вот как это реализовали в DBD? Давайте сделаем полностью невидимого маньяка который затягивает тебя в сон... Как выбраться из сна? Вам надо либо провалить проверку реакции (и то не факт что она тебе выпадет) или тебя разбудит тиммейт... И тут 1 проблема. Фреди видит тебя через пол+ карты когда ты в мире снов и как от него убежать чтоб ты очнулся и он заного не затянул тебя в сон? Вот именно выжившим просто некуда деваться! Я сам успел поиграть за него... Помимо мира снов вы ещё и дали ему предмет (выжившие вас не видят когда "засыпают"). Учитывая последних УБИЙЦ я уже чувствую что в следующем обновлении мы увидим маньяка который будет видеть выживших через всю карту, бегать в 2x раза быстрее обычного и валить всех в предсмертное расстояние с 1-ого обычного удара, а для лучшего комбо добавить ему способность "Медсестры" (телепорт). И да на обзор успели написать что у меня нету часов в игре и я "просто жалок". В ответ могу сказать что у меня есть аккаунт с 57 часами в игре. Спасибо за внимание! Надеюсь Фредика пофиксят в ближайшее время...

Le point fort de ce jeu est son ambiance qui nous fait revivre les grands frissons des films d'horreur aux boogymen iconiques! Si vous avez toujours rêvé d'incarner Leatherface, Krueger, Jason, vous devriez adorer. Le gameplay et bien pensé et assez équilibré, que l'on soit un tueur ou un survivant. Les boogeymen inventés pour le jeu sont très réussis et différents à jouer.
Quelques points noirs non négligeables: s'il n'est pas difficile de trouver une partie en survivant, c'est parfois plus long pour un tueur. Graphiquement, ce n'est pas terrible mais le tout est sauvé par les décors et l'ambiance.
Et enfin je trouve toujours inadmissible que l'on soit obligé de payer pour avoir des éléments censés ête présents dans le jeu d'origine, comme pour les nouveaux tueurs par exemple.
Un bon jeu multi cependant, parfait pour jouer avec une bande d'ami(e)s et surtout pendant la période d'Halloween! Espérons qu'il ne fera pas parti de ces nombreux jeux multi, hypés pendant quelques mois avant de sombrer dans l'oubli...
Muito viciante.
